content: this pullover is worked from the bottom up in pieces and seamed it features a fun stripe pattern in a super cozy yarn we recommend choosing a size that measures 4-6 larger than chest measurement sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x shown in size s finished measurements chest 36¼ 40¾ 43¾ 48 52¼ 56¾ 59¾ 64 68¼ length 24½ 25 25½ 26¼ 26¾ 27¼ 27¼ 27¼ 27¾ materials premier® yarns little bunny® brights 100% polyester 3 5 oz/100 g 109 yds/100m mc 2079-25 chocolate 3 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 8 balls cc1 2079-17 cream 2 2 3 3 3 4 4 4 5 balls cc2 2079-07 bubblegum 2 2 3 3 3 4 4 4 5 balls needles us size 11 8 mm and us size 10 5 6 5 mm straight needles or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle stitch holder or waste yarn locking stitch markers smooth yarn for seaming optional gauge 11 sts x 15 row = 4 in st st with larger needle save time check your gauge skills/techniques used in this pattern knit and purl stitches k2tog and ssk decreases placing stitches on hold seaming with mattress stitch picking up and knitting stitches changing colors working with textured yarn
